title: Safety Is Relative, Jordan Holds Grudges? 5.12.20
itunes:title: Safety Is Relative, Jordan Holds Grudges? 5.12.20
description:
In episode 628, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by The Black List's Kate Hagen to discuss states re-opening, how coronavirus spreads, #Plandemic going viral, The Last Dance recaps, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Coronavirus cases expanding in states preparing to reopen
  2. The Risks - Know Them - Avoid Them
  3. A 2nd wave of US virus cases will plunge the economy into a depression, Moody's economist says
  4. As '#Plandemic' goes viral, those targeted by discredited scientist's crusade warn of 'dangerous' claims
  5. Who is Judy Mikovits in ‘Plandemic,’ the coronavirus conspiracy video just banned from social media?
  6. Fact-checking ‘Plandemic’: A documentary full of false conspiracy theories about the coronavirus
  7. ESPN's Michael Jordan documentary: Big takeaways from Episodes 7 and 8 of 'The Last Dance'
  8. Craig Hodges: 'Jordan didn't speak out because he didn't know what to say'
  9. WATCH: Jurassic 5 - Swing Set

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
